title: The water so collected / recharged shall as far as possible be used for non-drinking and non- cooking purpose
clause_text: The water so collected / recharged shall as far as possible be used for non-drinking and non- cooking purpose. Provided that when the rain water in exceptional circumstances will be utilised for drinking and / or cooking purpose, it shall be ensured that proper filter arrangement and the separate outlet for bypassing the first rain water has been provided. Provided further that, will be ensured that for such use, proper disinfectants and the water purification arrangements have been made. The structures constructed under this provision shall not be counted towards FSI computation. Grey Water - It means waste water from bathrooms, sinks, shower and wash areas, etc.
